definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Do you shave yourself or go to the barbers?
sentences.chinese: 你是自已刮鬍子，還是去理髮廳。

sentences.english: I went to a hairdressing salon and had a new hair-do.
sentences.chinese: 我上理髮廳去做了一個新發式。

sentences.english: SHAVE】Do you shave yourself or go to the barber's?
sentences.chinese: 你是自己刮鬍子還是去理髮廳？

sentences.english: Go to the barber shop sometime, because your hair is getting long.
sentences.chinese: 找時間去理髮廳吧，你的頭髮越來越長了。

definition: you can net sparrows at the door (idiom); completely deserted
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
man behind the mirror/puppet master/string puller
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
plethora of things to tackle/multitude of loose ends/very complicated/chaotic
township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
Qianzhen or Chienchen district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
